html:
Trailer Tuesday needs you to blast folks to keep breathing, listen to dead people chat on a creepy planet, and save the world with fishing.

MULLET MADJACK

“Your HEALTH is TIME. You must KILL to get more TIME.”

MULLET MADJACK is available now on Steam.

cybeRRRevolution

“cybeRRRevolution (cyber-R-revolution) is an action-adventure game about talking with monsters, piloting godly mechas, and taking down bandits to secure a prosperous future for a nation in a post-war reality.”

cybeRRRevolution is available now on itch.io.

Sylvio: Black Waters

“Stranded on a desolate planet, decode the whispers of the dead to survive in an enthralling atmospheric exploration horror.”

Sylvio: Black Waters is available now on Steam.

Shui’s Odyssey

“Players use visual illusions to piece together fragments of memories from Alzheimer’s patients, in order to reconstruct the truth of the story and witness the passage of time for three generations.”

Shui’s Odyssey is available now on Steam.

BROK the InvestiGator – Natal Tail, A New Christmas

“When students Graff and Ott are called upon to celebrate “Natal Untail,” a corrupted version of Atlasia’s ancient tradition, they’ll discover that even in this decaying world, the values of sharing and friendship endure as life’s greatest treasures.”

BROK the InvestiGator – Natal Tail, A New Christmas is available now on the App Store, Google Play, itch.io, GOG, and Steam.

Bloodshed

“Face endless waves of undead foes, collect experience points, and upgrade your skills and weapons in a battle to survive the night.”

Bloodshed is available now on Steam Early Access.

Stars In The Trash

“Tired of feeling trapped at home, Moka, a spoiled cat decides to run away and seek adventure. Explore, make friends, fight, and escape from the kennelman.”

Stars In The Trash is available now on Steam.

Sea Fantasy

“This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent….”

Sea Fantasy is available now on Steam.

Discolored 2

“All the colors have gone missing from the world. While on a mission to bring them back you discover you are being hunted by those who would see the colors banished.”

Discolored 2 is available now on Steam.

Airborne Empire

“Build your sky city while exploring a vast landscape in this Open World RPG City Builder.”

Airborne Empire is available now on Steam Early Access.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
